body: nfpm with fixes for windows updated in https://github.com/goreleaser/goreleaser/commit/cc18ad5184233998e5e083ff0b00576fcdd651e9
it should be fixed in main... can you verify? thanks
Thanks ! @caarlos0 how can we run the goreleaser github action against the goreleaser version from master ?

> Thanks ! @caarlos0 how can we run the goreleaser github action against the goreleaser version from master ?

I think the easiest way is to `go install` and then run it
@caarlos0 I just tested building manually on a windows environment using goreleaser from master. The issues seems to be fixed as the .deb / .rpm files built are valid.
